Item.Name: MENU
Item.TreeDataQuery:
select -1,LEVEL,node_name,'',TEMP_NODE_ID 
from wiz_temp_menu 
connect by prior node_id = node_parent 
START WITH NODE_PARENT IS NULL 
ORDER BY NODE_ID

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TREE-NODE-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 PATH VARCHAR2(500);
 PATH_R VARCHAR2(300);
 A VARCHAR2(500);

 form_name VARCHAR2(100);

 RPT_PATH VARCHAR2(1000);
 


 rpt_id NUMBER(14); 
 table_name VARCHAR2(100); 
 rpt_name VARCHAR2(100); 
 rpt_query VARCHAR2(10000); 
 rpt_cmp_cheading_cname VARCHAR2(1000); 
 list_values VARCHAR2(1000);
 
/************* RIZWAN ***********/
lnum_node_id VARCHAR2(500);
lvch_parameters VARCHAR2(2000);
lvch_qualifier VARCHAR2(1); 
/************* RIZWAN ***********/
lvch_main_function_name VARCHAR2(100);

lvch_node_description varchar2(100);
plst_id PARAMLIST;

lnum_cnt number(14);
BEGIN


 N_NAME := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;

 lnum_node_id := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 
 lvch_node_description := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 
 SELECT NODE_PATH, MENU_PARAMETERS,form_internal_name 
 INTO 
 PATH, lvch_parameters,lvch_main_function_name 
 FROM WIZ_TEMP_MENU,WIZ_SYSTEM_MAIN_FUNCTION F 
 WHERE TEMP_NODE_ID = lnum_node_id
 AND WIZ_TEMP_MENU.SUB_FUN_ID = F.MAIN_FUNCTION_ID(+);

 

 A:=INSTR(PATH,'\',-1);
 PATH_R:=SUBSTR(PATH,A+1); 

 IF lvch_main_function_name IS NULL THEN 
 lvch_main_function_name := SUBSTR(PATH_R,1,LENGTH(PATH_R)-4);
 END IF;
 
 IF PATH IS NULL THEN
 -- MESSAGE('NO DETAIL AVAILABLE!');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 
 IF SUBSTR(PATH_R,-3,3) = 'CRT' THEN 
 BEGIN 
 
 SELECT rpt_id, table_name, rpt_name, rpt_query, rpt_cmp_cheading_cname, list_values 
 INTO
 rpt_id, table_name, rpt_name, rpt_query, rpt_cmp_cheading_cname, list_values
 FROM WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION D
 WHERE UPPER(D.TABLE_NAME) = UPPER(SUBSTR(PATH_R,1,LENGTH(PATH_R)-4));
 
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'Parm_query',TEXT_PARAMETER,RPT_QUERY);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_APP_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,'WIZERP');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_rep_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,get_value_at(rpt_cmp_cheading_cname ,1,',',1));
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_co_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,get_value_at(rpt_cmp_cheading_cname ,2,',',1));
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_LIST_VALUES',TEXT_PARAMETER,LIST_VALUES);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_REP_SOURCE',TEXT_PARAMETER,RPT_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FORM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,LVCH_NODE_DESCRIPTION);

 -------------
 lnum_cnt := 0; 
 FOR ICUR IN 3..how_many_chars(RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',0) LOOP
 lnum_cnt := lnum_cnt +1;
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_'|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lnum_cnt||'-jan-1900','DD-MON-YYYY'),'DDSPTH') ||'_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,get_value_at(rpt_cmp_cheading_cname ,ICUR,',',1));
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_'|| TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(lnum_cnt||'-jan-1900','DD-MON-YYYY'),'DDSPTH') ||'_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,get_value_at(rpt_cmp_cheading_cname ,ICUR,',',1));
 END LOOP;
 
 CALL_FORM('CRT_'||get_numeric_part(RPT_NAME)||'COL.FMX',NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 ALERT_CAUTION('This Listing is not defined in definition table ');
 END;
 
 ELSE
 
 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN
 PRO_FORM_CALL(PATH, lvch_parameters);
 ELSE
 PRO_FORM_CALL(PATH_R, lvch_parameters);
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

Block.Name: DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT
Block.WhereClause:
F.TEMP_NODE_ID = T.TEMP_NODE_ID(+) 
AND (T.NODE_ID IS NOT NULL OR 
 (
 T.NODE_ID IS NULL AND 
 SUBSTR(F.TEMP_NODE_ID,1,2)='T:'
 )
 )
AND F.EMPLOYEE_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID
AND F.WIZMENU_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_ID

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-ACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 --N_NAME FTREE.NODE;
 N_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 PATH VARCHAR2(500);
 PATH_R VARCHAR2(300);
 A NUMBER;
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
 plst_id PARAMLIST; 
 p_list PARAMLIST;
 label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_id FORMMODULE;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 htree ITEM;
 P_find_node FTREE.NODE;
 lent NUMBER;
 /*********abid*************/
 lvch_val_length VARCHAR2(100);
 cursor clm_returen(parm_tbl_name varchar2) is SELECT * FROM WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION
 WHERE UPPER(TABLE_NAME)= UPPER(parm_tbl_name);
 LRTYPE_RPT_DEF WIZ_REPORT_DEFINITION%ROWTYPE;
 RPT_PATH VARCHAR2(1000);
 
 CMP_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 FIRST_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); SECOND_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); THIRD_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 FOURTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); FIFTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); SIXTH_CLM_NAME vARCHAR2(50);
 SEVENTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); EIGHT_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50); NINTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 TENTH_CLM_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 lnum_loc NUMBER(3);
 TBL_NAME VARCHAR2(100);--:= FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 
 frm_name VARCHAR2(100);
 RPT_NAME VARCHAR2(50);

 
 /*********abid*************/

 
BEGIN
 
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');

 
 N_NAME := :LIST_NODE_NAME;
 IF UPPER(SUBSTR(N_NAME,-7))='LISTING' THEN
 lent:=length(N_NAME);
 N_NAME:=SUBSTR(N_NAME,1,lent-8);
 N_NAME:=N_NAME||'\rep';
 END IF; 
 SELECT NODE_PATH INTO PATH FROM WIZMENU_COMPOSITE WHERE NODE_NAME=N_NAME;
 --PATH := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 
 A:=INSTR(PATH,'\',-1);
 PATH_R:=SUBSTR(PATH,A+1); 
 
 

-------------------------------------IF PATH IS NULL---------------------------------------

 IF PATH IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE('NO DETAIL AVAILABLE!',NO_ACKNOWLEDGE);

-------------------------------------PATH IS NOT NULL--------------------------------------

 ELSE 
 form_name:=substr(path_r,1,length(path_r)-4);

-------------------------------------CHECK IF CHK_PATH IS 1-------------------------------- 

 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN

-------------------------------------IF FILE EXT IS FMX------------------------------------ 

 IF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='FMX' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='fmx' THEN
 --label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 label_name:=:LIST_NODE_NAME;
---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL NARRATION FORM-----------------------------------
 IF label_name = 'Journal Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL DESCRIPTION FORM----------------------------------- 

 ELSIF label_name = 'Journal Description' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;
 END IF;
--------------------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL FORM-----------------------------------
 IF label_name IN('Journal','Encumbrance Journal') THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 IF label_name=('Journal') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'J');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'E');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
----------------------------------------IF OTHER FORMS------------------------------------- 
 ELSE
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM(PATH,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
 
---------------------------------------IF REPORT WITH PATH-----------------------------------
 ELSIF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='REP' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='rep' THEN
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 /********* abid *****************************/
 
 --message('Criteria Forms Called ');
 ELSIF UPPER(SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2))='CRT' THEN 
 Clear_message;
 BEGIN
 lvch_val_length:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 --open clm_returen(FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE));
 open clm_returen(SUBSTR(lvch_val_length,1,LENGTH(lvch_val_length)-4));
 FETCH clm_returen INTO LRTYPE_RPT_DEF;
 if clm_returen%notfound then
 message('Values are not set in Definition Table');
 end if; 
 close clm_returen;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('No data found');
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGE('Values are not set in Report Definition Table');
 MESSAGE(' text '||dbms_error_text); 
 END;
 IF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 RPT_PATH := 'D:\Projects\Wizerp\REPORT\'||LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME;
 --message('table name is '||FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE));
 RPT_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,0,FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)-1 );
 CMP_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)-FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',1,1)-1 );
 FIRST_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',2,1)-1);
 SECOND_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',3,1)-1);
 THIRD_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',4,1)-1);
 FOURTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',5,1)-1);
 FIFTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',6,1)-1);
 SIXTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',7,1)-1);
 SEVENTH_CLM_NAME := SUBSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)+1,
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',9,1)-
 FUN_INSTR(LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_CMP_CHEADING_CNAME,',',8,1)-1 );
 IF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_1COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_1COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_2COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_2COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_3COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_3COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_4COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_4COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_5COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_5COL';
 ELSIF LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME='WIZ_REP_6COL.rep' THEN frm_name := 'CRT_6COL';
 END IF;
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'Parm_query',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_QUERY);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_APP_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,'WIZERP');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_rep_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,RPT_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_co_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,CMP_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_LIST_VALUES',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.LIST_VALUES);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_REP_SOURCE',TEXT_PARAMETER,LRTYPE_RPT_DEF.RPT_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FORM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,
 FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL));
 
 
 /*ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SUBSTR(FIRST_CLM_NAME,1,
 FUN_INSTR(FIRST_CLM_NAME,' ',1,1)));*/
 IF FIRST_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIRST_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIRST_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIRST_CLM_NAME);
 END IF;
 IF SECOND_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,SECOND_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SECOND_CLM_NAME);
 /*ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SECOND_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SUBSTR(SECOND_CLM_NAME,1,
 FUN_INSTR(SECOND_CLM_NAME,' ',1,1)));*/
 END IF;
 IF THIRD_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_THIRD_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,THIRD_CLM_NAME);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_THIRD_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,THIRD_CLM_NAME);
 END IF;
 IF FOURTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FOURTH_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,FOURTH_CLM_NAME );
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FOURTH_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,FOURTH_CLM_NAME );
 END IF;
 IF FIFTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIFTH_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIFTH_CLM_NAME );
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_FIFTH_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,FIFTH_CLM_NAME );
 END IF;
 IF SIXTH_CLM_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SIXTH_CLM_NAME',TEXT_PARAMETER,SIXTH_CLM_NAME );
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_SIXTH_CLM_DESC',TEXT_PARAMETER,SIXTH_CLM_NAME );
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'paramform',TEXT_PARAMETER,'NO'); 
 --RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,RPT_PATH,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,plst_id,null);
 --OPEN_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name ,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id); 
 --CALL_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name,HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 CALL_FORM('D:\Projects\Wizerp\Forms\Criteria forms\'||frm_name,NO_HIDE,NO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,plst_id); 
 END IF;
 /* ELSE
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH_R,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 END IF;*/
 
 
 /********** abid *****************************/
 
 END IF; 
/*
--------------------------------ELSE CHECKING FOR SEGMENT VALUES-----------------------------
 ELSE
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',N_NAME);
 label_name:=:LIST_NODE_NAME --FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 IF label_name = 'Segment Values' 
 OR label_name = 'Listings' 
 THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT02');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,PATH);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 IF label_name='Segment Values' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\WIZERP\FORMS\FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 ELSIF label_name='Listings' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('D:\PROJECTS\WIZERP\FORMS\FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 END IF; */

--------------------------------IF CHK_PATH IS 0--------------------------------------------

 ELSE
 IF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='FMX' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='fmx' THEN
 label_name:=:LIST_NODE_NAME;--FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',N_NAME,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL NARRATION FORM-----------------------------------

 IF label_name = 'Journal Narration' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_LINE_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;

---------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL DESCRIPTION FORM----------------------------------- 

 ELSIF label_name = 'Journal Description' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');
 add_parameter(p_list,'MAST_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DET_QUERY_SOURCE',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS a,FLEX_VALUE_SET_MT B');
 add_parameter(p_list,'WHERE_CLAUSE',text_parameter,'B.value_set_id=A.value_set_id');
 add_parameter(p_list,'DML_TARGET',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_FIELDS A');
 add_parameter(p_list,'PARM_FORM_NAME',text_parameter,'JRN_MT_DESC_MT');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 END IF;
 END IF;
--------------------------------CHECKING FOR JOURNAL FORM-----------------------------------
 IF label_name IN('Journal','Encumbrance Journal') THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 IF label_name=('Journal') THEN
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'J');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 ELSE
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'PARM_MENU_BUTTON',TEXT_PARAMETER,'E');
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
----------------------------------------IF OTHER FORMS------------------------------------- 
 ELSE
 form_id:=FIND_FORM(form_name);
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM(PATH_R,ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
---------------------------------------IF REPORT WITH PATH-----------------------------------
 ELSIF SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='REP' OR SUBSTR(PATH_R,LENGTH(PATH_R)-2)='rep' THEN
 RUN_PRODUCT(REPORTS,PATH_R,ASYNCHRONOUS,RUNTIME,FILESYSTEM,'');
 END IF;
 
 END IF;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('Exception'); 
END; 
/*
--------------------------------ELSE CHECKING FOR SEGMENT VALUES-----------------------------
 ELSE
 lnod_node_parent := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PARENT('MENU',N_NAME);
 label_name:=FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',lnod_node_parent,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 IF label_name = 'Segment Values' 
 OR label_name = 'Listings' 
 THEN
 plst_id := GET_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 IF ID_NULL(plst_id) THEN
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 ELSE
 DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(plst_id); 
 plst_id := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('plst_form_params');
 END IF;
 --ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT02');
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_table_name',TEXT_PARAMETER,PATH);
 ADD_PARAMETER(plst_id,'parm_struc_id',TEXT_PARAMETER,:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID);
 IF label_name='Segment Values' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 ELSIF label_name='Listings' THEN
 form_id:=FIND_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING');
 IF NOT id_null(form_id) THEN
 GO_FORM(form_id);
 ELSE
 OPEN_FORM('FORM_SEGMENT_LISTING.FMX',ACTIVATE,SESSION,NO_SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,plst_id);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 
---------------------------------END IF CHK_PATH-------------------------------------------- 
 END IF;
---------------------------------END IF PATH------------------------------------------------
 END IF;
END;*/

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
--ALERT_ERROR('TRIGGER NODE "' ||:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_RECORD);

IF :NODE_PATH IS NOT NULL THEN 
 PRO_FORM_CALL(:NODE_PATH,:MENU_PARAMETERS);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-ENTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :NODE_PATH IS NOT NULL THEN 
 PRO_FORM_CALL(:NODE_PATH,:MENU_PARAMETERS);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*
IF :TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE IS NOT NULL THEN
 UPDATE WIZMENU_DET_FAVORITE
 SET NODE_DESC = :TEXT_NEW_NODE_DESC
 WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID AND
 TEMP_NODE_ID = :TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE ;
ELSE
 
END IF;
*/
F_ADD(:TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE,:TEXT_NEW_NODE_DESC,:TEXT_NEW_SEQUENCE_NO);

go_block('DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT');
execute_query;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 IF :TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE IS NOT NULL AND :TEXT_NEW_NODE_DESC IS NULL THEN 
 select node_NAME
 INTO
 :TEXT_NEW_NODE_DESC
 from wizmenu_det_favorite
 where employee_id = :parameter.PARM_USER_ID AND
 TEMP_NODE_ID = :TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PBTN_UPDATE_ADD',LABEL,'Update');
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PBTN_UPDATE_ADD',LABEL,'Add');
 END IF;
end;

MenuItem.Name: COLLAPSE_NODE
MenuItem.Label: Collapse Node
MenuItem.MenuItemCode:
DECLARE
 htree ITEM;
 lnod_clicked_node FTREE.NODE;
BEGIN
 htree := FIND_ITEM('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 lnod_clicked_node := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 IF FTREE.GET_TREE_SELECTION(htree,1) = lnod_clicked_node THEN
 FTREE.SET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,lnod_clicked_node,FTREE.NODE_STATE,FTREE.COLLAPSED_NODE);
 END IF;
END;

MenuItem.Name: EXPAND_NODE
MenuItem.Label: Expand Node
MenuItem.MenuItemCode:
DECLARE
 htree ITEM;
 lnod_clicked_node FTREE.NODE;
BEGIN
 htree := FIND_ITEM('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 lnod_clicked_node := :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE;
 IF FTREE.GET_TREE_SELECTION(htree,1) = lnod_clicked_node THEN
 FTREE.SET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY(htree,lnod_clicked_node,FTREE.NODE_STATE,FTREE.EXPANDED_NODE);
 END IF;
END;

MenuItem.Name: ADD_TO_FAVOURITES
MenuItem.Label: Add To Favourites
MenuItem.MenuItemCode:
DECLARE
 lnum_node_id VARCHAR2(100);
 LVCH_NODE_DESC VARCHAR2(100);
 lnum_cnt number(14);
 lnum_emp_id number(14):= pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_emp;
 N_NAME ftree.node;
 
 lnum_seq_no number(10);
BEGIN

 lnum_node_id := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_VALUE);
 LVCH_NODE_DESC := FTREE.GET_TREE_NODE_PROPERTY('MENU',:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_NODE,FTREE.NODE_LABEL);
 
 F_ADD_MENU(lnum_node_id,LVCH_NODE_DESC); 
--F_ADD(lnum_node_id,LVCH_NODE_DESC);

/*
 ALERT_ERROR(lnum_node_id);
 ALERT_ERROR(LVCH_NODE_DESC );
 
 select nvl(max(SEQUENCE_NO),0)+1
 into
 lnum_seq_no 
 from wizmenu_det_favorite f
 where employee_id = lnum_emp_id;
 
 insert into wizmenu_det_favorite (employee_id,temp_node_id,node_desc,sequence_no)
 values(lnum_emp_id,lnum_node_id,LVCH_NODE_DESC,lnum_seq_no);
 
 commit;
 
 GO_BLOCK('DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 
 GO_BLOCK('TREE_BLOCK');
*/ 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: REFRESH
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE REFRESH IS
BEGIN
 
-- MESSAGE(''''||GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(DATASOURCE)||''''); 
IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(DATASOURCE) <> 'ORACLE' THEN
 MESSAGE('NOT CONNECTED TO DATABASE');
ELSE
 ftree.POPULATE_TREE('menu');
END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_SEG_NODE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POP_SEG_NODE(PARENT_NODE VARCHAR2,PNUM_CHILD_NODE VARCHAR2,PNUM_STRUC_ID NUMBER) IS 
 htree ITEM;
 tree_parent_node FTREE.NODE;
 tree_child_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(5);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 temp_rgrp_child RECORDGROUP;
 new_parent_node NUMBER(14):= '';
 new_child_node NUMBER(14):= '';
 tree_center_node NUMBER(14):= '';
 strcuture_desc VARCHAR2(100);
 fetch_strcuture_id NUMBER(14);
 CNT NUMBER(14);
 CNT_CHILD NUMBER(14);
 fetch_segment VARCHAR2(100);
 
BEGIN
 --IF PARENT_NODE = 'General Ledger' THEN
 --:PARAMETER.PARM_STRUC_ID:=1;
 
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 tree_parent_node := '';
 tree_parent_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 --'General Ledger',
 PARENT_NODE,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);
 IF tree_parent_node IS NOT NULL THEN
 tree_center_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree,
 'Segment Values',
 --PARENT_NODE,
 --PNUM_CHILD_NODE,
 --'Setup',
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 tree_parent_node);
 END IF;
 
 IF tree_center_node IS NOT NULL THEN
 tree_child_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 --'Segment Values',
 --PARENT_NODE,
 PNUM_CHILD_NODE,
 --'Setup',
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 tree_center_node);
 END IF;
 temp_rgrp := FIND_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 IF NOT ID_NULL(temp_rgrp) THEN
 DELETE_GROUP(temp_rgrp);
 END IF;
 temp_rgrp := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT',
 'SELECT STRUCTURE_DESC a,structure_id b 
 FROM WIZ_STRUCTURE_MT WHERE STRUCTURE_TYPE_ID = '||PNUM_STRUC_ID || 'ORDER BY B');
 var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 CNT := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 
 
 
 IF CNT > 0 THEN -- IF THE PARENT KEY LIST IS FILLED
 FOR j IN 1..CNT LOOP 
 strcuture_desc := GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT.a', j ); 
 fetch_strcuture_id := GET_GROUP_NUMBER_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT.b', j ); 
 -- MESSAGE('FTTCH ID IS '||fetch_strcuture_id);
 new_parent_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 tree_child_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 strcuture_desc,
 NULL,
 --'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT'||'0'||j
 'ZZZZZZ'
 );
 --'\\Rizwan\Projects\WizERP\Forms\FORM_WIZ_SEGMENTS_MD.fmx');
 temp_rgrp_child := FIND_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD');
 IF NOT ID_NULL(temp_rgrp_child) THEN
 DELETE_GROUP(temp_rgrp_child);
 END IF;
 
 temp_rgrp_child := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD',
 'select segment_desc SEGMENT from wiz_segment_definition where structure_id = ' || fetch_strcuture_id ||' ORDER BY SEGMENT_NO' );
 
 var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD');
 CNT_CHILD := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD');
 IF CNT_CHILD > 0 THEN 
 FOR R IN 1..CNT_CHILD LOOP 
 fetch_segment := GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD.SEGMENT', R ); 
 new_child_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 new_parent_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 fetch_segment,
 NULL,
 'VIEW_WIZ_SEGMENT'||'0'||R||'-'||fetch_strcuture_id ||'F' -- F FOR FORM
 
 );
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_FORM_CALL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_FORM_CALL(parm_form_name VARCHAR2, parm_parm_string VARCHAR2) IS

 PATH VARCHAR2(1000);
 PATH_R VARCHAR2(1000);
 A NUMBER;
 lnod_node_parent FTREE.NODE;
 plst_id PARAMLIST; 
 p_list PARAMLIST;
 label_name VARCHAR2(100);
 form_name VARCHAR2(500);
 form_id FORMMODULE;

 lvch_parameters WIZMENU_COMPOSITE.MENU_PARAMETERS%TYPE;
 lnum_carrot_sign NUMBER(14);
 lnum_instr NUMBER(14) := 1;
 lvch_str VARCHAR2(5000) := parm_parm_string;
 lvch_remaining_str VARCHAR2(5000);
 lnum_number NUMBER := 1;
 lvch_parm_name VARCHAR2(1000);
 lvch_parm_value VARCHAR2(5000);
 
 LVCH_OLD_DB VARCHAR2(100);
 LVCH_NEW_DB VARCHAR2(100);
 UN VARCHAR2(100);
 PW VARCHAR2(100); 
BEGIN
 PATH := parm_form_name;
 A := INSTR(PATH,'\',-1);

 PATH_R:=SUBSTR(PATH,A+1); 

 
 form_name := SUBSTR(path_r,1,length(path_r)-4);

 IF :CHK_PATH=1 THEN
 IF parm_parm_string IS NOT NULL THEN
 p_list := get_parameter_list('p_list');
 IF NOT id_null(p_list) THEN
 destroy_parameter_list(p_list);
 END IF;
 p_list := create_parameter_list('p_list');

 FOR R IN 0..HOW_MANY_CHARS(parm_parm_string,'^',1) LOOP
 
 lnum_instr := INSTR(lvch_str,'^');
 lnum_number := lnum_number + lnum_instr;
 IF lnum_instr > 0 THEN
 lvch_str := SUBSTR(lvch_str,1,lnum_instr-1);
 ELSIF lnum_instr > 0 THEN
 lvch_str := SUBSTR(lvch_str,1);
 END IF;
 
 lvch_parm_name := SUBSTR(lvch_str,1,INSTR(lvch_str,'=')-1);
 lvch_parm_value := SUBSTR(lvch_str,INSTR(lvch_str,'=')+1);
 
 IF lvch_parm_name = '@' THEN 
 LVCH_NEW_DB := lvch_parm_value;
 ELSE
 ADD_PARAMETER(p_list, lvch_parm_name, TEXT_PARAMETER, lvch_parm_value); 
 END IF;
 
 lvch_remaining_str := SUBSTR(parm_parm_string,lnum_number);
 lvch_str := lvch_remaining_str;

 END LOOP;

 END IF;
 
 IF LVCH_NEW_DB IS NOT NULL THEN
 LVCH_OLD_DB := GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(USERNAME)||'/'||GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(PASSWORD);
 IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CONNECT_STRING) IS NOT NULL THEN
 LVCH_OLD_DB := LVCH_OLD_DB ||'@'||GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CONNECT_STRING);
 END IF;
 
 UN := GET_VALUE_AT(LVCH_NEW_DB,1,'/',0);
 PW := GET_VALUE_AT(LVCH_NEW_DB,2,'/',0);
 
 LOGOUT;
 LOGON(UN,PW);
 
 END IF;

 UN := GET_VALUE_AT(LVCH_OLD_DB,1,'/',0);
 PW := GET_VALUE_AT(LVCH_OLD_DB,2,'/',0);

 
 OPEN_FORM(form_name,ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,p_list);
 --CALL_FORM(form_name,NO_HIDE,DO_REPLACE,NO_QUERY_ONLY,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,p_list);

 IF LVCH_NEW_DB IS NOT NULL THEN
 LOGOUT;
 LOGON(UN,PW);
 END IF;

 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: WIN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE WIN IS

 PROCEDURE CHANGE_ICON(ICON_FILE VARCHAR2);
-- PRAGMA INTERFACE(C,externICON,11265);

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: WIN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY WIN IS
 FUNCTION externICON ( hFunc IN ORA_FFI.funcHandleType,
 hWnd IN PLS_INTEGER,
 IconFile IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 IconIndex IN PLS_INTEGER,
 IconFileSM IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 IconIndexSM IN PLS_INTEGER)
 return PLS_INTEGER;
 PRAGMA INTERFACE(C,externICON,11265);
 
 
 PROCEDURE CHANGE_ICON(ICON_FILE VARCHAR2) IS 
 
 hDLL ORA_FFI.LibHandleType;
 fh_ChangeIcon ora_ffi.funcHandleType;
 vcBuff1 varchar2(512);
 vcBuff2 varchar2(512);
 vcBuff3 varchar2(512);
 iBuff1 pls_integer;
 iBuff2 pls_integer;
 iBuff3 pls_integer;
 iRC pls_integer;
 
BEGIN
 
 hDLL := ORA_FFI.LOAD_LIBRARY('', 'D2KWUT60.DLL');
 fh_ChangeIcon := ora_ffi.register_function(hDLL,'d2kwutil_ChangeMDIIcon',ora_ffi.PASCAL_STD);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT); 
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_CHAR_PTR);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_CHAR_PTR);
 ora_ffi.register_parameter(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT);
 ora_ffi.register_return(fh_ChangeIcon,ORA_FFI.C_INT);
 

 vcBuff1 := rpad(ICON_FILE,255,chr(0));
 vcBuff2 := rpad(ICON_FILE,255,chr(0));
 iBuff1 := GET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(FORMS_MDI_WINDOW,WINDOW_HANDLE);--MDIWindow;
 iBuff2 := 0;
 iBuff3 := 0;
 
 iRC := externICON(fh_ChangeIcon,iBuff1,vcBuff1,iBuff2,vcBuff2,iBuff3);

END;


END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_SEG_NODE_LISTINGS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POP_SEG_NODE_LISTINGS(PARENT_NODE VARCHAR2,PNUM_CHILD_NODE VARCHAR2,PNUM_STRUC_ID NUMBER) IS 
 htree ITEM;
 tree_parent_node FTREE.NODE;
 tree_child_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(14);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 temp_rgrp_child RECORDGROUP;
 new_parent_node NUMBER(14):= '';
 new_child_node NUMBER(14):= '';
 tree_center_node NUMBER(14):= '';
 strcuture_desc VARCHAR2(100);
 fetch_strcuture_id NUMBER(14);
 CNT NUMBER(14);
 CNT_CHILD NUMBER(14);
 fetch_segment VARCHAR2(100);
 
BEGIN
 htree := Find_Item('TREE_BLOCK.MENU');
 tree_parent_node := '';
 tree_parent_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree,
 --'General Ledger',
 PARENT_NODE,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE);

 IF tree_parent_node IS NOT NULL THEN
 tree_center_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree,
 'Segment Listings',
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 tree_parent_node);
 END IF;
 
 IF tree_center_node IS NOT NULL THEN
 tree_child_node := Ftree.Find_Tree_Node(htree, 
 PNUM_CHILD_NODE,
 Ftree.FIND_NEXT,
 Ftree.NODE_LABEL,
 Ftree.ROOT_NODE, 
 tree_center_node);
 END IF;
 temp_rgrp := FIND_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 IF NOT ID_NULL(temp_rgrp) THEN
 DELETE_GROUP(temp_rgrp);
 END IF;
 temp_rgrp := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT',
 'SELECT STRUCTURE_DESC a,structure_id b 
 FROM WIZ_STRUCTURE_MT WHERE STRUCTURE_TYPE_ID = '||PNUM_STRUC_ID || 'ORDER BY B');
 var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 CNT := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT');
 IF CNT > 0 THEN -- IF THE PARENT KEY LIST IS FILLED
 FOR j IN 1..CNT LOOP 
 strcuture_desc := GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT.a', j ); 
 fetch_strcuture_id := GET_GROUP_NUMBER_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT.b', j ); 
 new_parent_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 tree_child_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 strcuture_desc,
 NULL,
 'ZZZZZZ'
 );
 
 temp_rgrp_child := FIND_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD');
 IF NOT ID_NULL(temp_rgrp_child) THEN
 DELETE_GROUP(temp_rgrp_child);
 END IF;
 
 temp_rgrp_child := CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD',
 'select segment_desc SEGMENT from wiz_segment_definition where structure_id = ' || fetch_strcuture_id ||' ORDER BY SEGMENT_NO' );
 var_temp := POPULATE_GROUP('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD');
 CNT_CHILD := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT('RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD');
 IF CNT_CHILD > 0 THEN 
 FOR R IN 1..CNT_CHILD LOOP 
 fetch_segment := GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL( 'RGRP_CHK_SEGMENT_CHILD.SEGMENT', R ); 
 new_child_node := Ftree.Add_Tree_Node(htree,
 new_parent_node,
 Ftree.PARENT_OFFSET,
 Ftree.LAST_CHILD,
 Ftree.expanded_NODE,
 fetch_segment,
 NULL,
 'WIZ_SEGMENT'||'0'||R||'-'||fetch_strcuture_id ||'L' -- L FOR LISTING
 
 );
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 
 END LOOP;
 END IF; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: F_MOVE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE F_MOVE(PARM_UP_DOWN NUMBER /*1 FOR UP -1 FOR DOWN*/) IS
 
 LNUM_CURR_NODE_ID VARCHAR2(100);
 LNUM_CURR_NODE_SEQ VARCHAR2(100);
 
 LNUM_OTHER_NODE_ID VARCHAR2(100);
 LNUM_OTHER_NODE_SEQ VARCHAR2(100);
 
 LNUM_CURR_RECORD NUMBER := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 
BEGIN
 
 IF (PARM_UP_DOWN = 1 AND :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD = 1) OR
 (PARM_UP_DOWN = -1 AND :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE') 
 THEN 
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 
 LNUM_CURR_NODE_ID := :TEXT_NODE_ID;
 LNUM_CURR_NODE_SEQ := :SEQUENCE_NO;
 
 IF PARM_UP_DOWN = 1 THEN
 PREVIOUS_RECORD;
 ELSE
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END IF;

 LNUM_OTHER_NODE_ID := :TEXT_NODE_ID;
 LNUM_OTHER_NODE_SEQ := :SEQUENCE_NO;

 UPDATE WIZMENU_DET_FAVORITE
 SET SEQUENCE_NO = LNUM_OTHER_NODE_SEQ
 WHERE TEMP_NODE_ID = LNUM_CURR_NODE_ID;

 UPDATE WIZMENU_DET_FAVORITE
 SET SEQUENCE_NO = LNUM_CURR_NODE_SEQ
 WHERE TEMP_NODE_ID = LNUM_OTHER_NODE_ID;
 
 COMMIT;
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 
 IF PARM_UP_DOWN = 1 THEN
 GO_RECORD(LNUM_CURR_RECORD -1 ); 
 ELSE
 GO_RECORD(LNUM_CURR_RECORD +1 ); 
 END IF;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: F_REMOVE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE F_REMOVE IS

 lnum_node_id WIZMENU_DET.NODE_ID%TYPE;
 lnum_emp_id number(14):= pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_emp;
BEGIN

 
 DELETE wizmenu_det_favorite 
 WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = lnum_emp_id AND
 TEMP_NODE_ID = :TEXT_NODE_ID;
 
 commit;
 clear_record;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: F_ADD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE F_ADD(PARM_TEMP_NODE_ID VARCHAR2,PARM_NODE_DESC VARCHAR2,PARM_NODE_SEQ NUMBER) IS

 lnum_cnt number(14);
 lnum_emp_id number(14):= pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_emp;
 N_NAME ftree.node;
 
 lnum_seq_no number(10);
 
 lnum_tmep_node_id varchar2(500);
 
 lnum_dumy_yn NUMBER(1);
 
BEGIN
 IF PARM_NODE_SEQ IS NULL THEN 
 select nvl(max(SEQUENCE_NO),0)+1
 into
 lnum_seq_no 
 from wizmenu_det_favorite f
 where employee_id = lnum_emp_id and
 wizmenu_id = :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_ID;
 ELSE
 lnum_seq_no := PARM_NODE_SEQ; 
 END IF;
 
 
 IF PARM_TEMP_NODE_ID IS NULL THEN
 select nvl(max(substr(temp_node_id,3)),0)+1
 into 
 lnum_tmep_node_id 
 from wizmenu_det_favorite
 where substr(temp_node_id,1,2) = 'T:';
 
 lnum_tmep_node_id := 'T:'||lnum_tmep_node_id ;
 lnum_dumy_yn := 1; 
 else 
 DELETE FROM WIZMENU_DET_FAVORITE
 WHERE TEMP_NODE_ID = PARM_TEMP_NODE_ID AND
 EMPLOYEE_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID;
 
 lnum_tmep_node_id := parm_temp_node_id;
 lnum_dumy_yn := 0;
 END IF;
 
 insert into wizmenu_det_favorite (employee_id,temp_node_id,node_NAME,sequence_no,WIZMENU_ID,DUMY_YN)
 values(lnum_emp_id,lnum_tmep_node_id,PARM_NODE_DESC,lnum_seq_no,:PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_ID,lnum_dumy_yn);
 
 commit;
 
 GO_BLOCK('DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 
 GO_BLOCK('TREE_BLOCK');
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: F_ADD_SEPARATOR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE F_ADD_SEPARATOR IS
BEGIN
 
 :TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE := NULL;
 :TEXT_NEW_NODE_DESC := NULL;
 
 :TEXT_NEW_SEQUENCE_NO := NULL;
 
 GO_BLOCK('CBLK_ADD_EDIT_NODE');
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: F_ADD_MENU
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE F_ADD_MENU(PARM_node_id VARCHAR2,PARM_NODE_DESC VARCHAR2) IS
BEGIN
BEGIN
 
 :TEXT_NODE_ID_FOR_UPDATE := PARM_node_id;
 :TEXT_NEW_NODE_DESC := PARM_NODE_DESC;
 
 :TEXT_NEW_SEQUENCE_NO := NULL;
 
 GO_BLOCK('CBLK_ADD_EDIT_NODE');
 
END;END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 htree ITEM;
 find_node FTREE.NODE;
 var_temp NUMBER(14);
 temp_rgrp RECORDGROUP;
 new_node NUMBER(14);
 item_value VARCHAR2(30);
 CNT NUMBER(14);
 TIM TIMER;
 TIM2 TIMER;
 RGRP_POP NUMBER;
 A NUMBER;
 N_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 
 LVCH_USERNAME VARCHAR2(100);
 LVCH_CO_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 lvch_window_title VARCHAR2(200); 
 
 LVCH_LIECENCE_CODE VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('POPUP_MENU.PASTE_NODE',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 TIM := CREATE_TIMER('SPLASH',5000,NO_REPEAT);
 TIM2 := CREATE_TIMER('NF',900,REPEAT);

-- WIN.CHANGE_ICON('D:\12.ico');
 -- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,HEIGHT,1); 
 -- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,WIDTH,1); 
 -- set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,minimize);
 
 
 :PARAMETER.PARM_SET_OF_BOOK_ID := :GLOBAL.gnum_set_of_book_id;
 :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID := :GLOBAL.gnum_login_emp;
 :PARAMETER.PARM_INV_ORG := :GLOBAL.gnum_inventory_org;
 
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 
 SELECT FIRST_NAME||' '||LAST_NAME 
 INTO
 LVCH_USERNAME
 FROM EMPLOYEE_MT
 WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_USER_ID;
 END IF;
 

 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_SET_OF_BOOK_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 
 SELECT SHORT_DESC 
 INTO
 LVCH_CO_NAME
 FROM ORGANIZATION_INFO
 WHERE set_of_book_id = :PARAMETER.PARM_SET_OF_BOOK_ID;
 END IF;

 
 SELECT LICENCE_CODE 
 INTO 
 LVCH_LIECENCE_CODE 
 FROM wiz_licenced_to ;
 

 IF LVCH_LIECENCE_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 
 LVCH_LIECENCE_CODE := ' - ('||LVCH_LIECENCE_CODE||')';
 END IF;
 
 :MENU_TITLE := :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_TITLE||LVCH_LIECENCE_CODE;
 
 
 lvch_window_title := :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_TITLE||' - ';
 
 IF pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_balancing_seg_id IS NULL THEN
 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title||LVCH_CO_NAME;
 ELSE 
 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title||pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_balancing_seg_desc ;
 END IF; 
 
 IF pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_period_id IS NOT NULL THEN
 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title||'/'||pckg_gcnsts.pnum_login_period_desc ;
 END IF; 

 lvch_window_title := lvch_window_title ||' ('||LVCH_USERNAME||') '; 
 
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,TITLE,lvch_window_title );
 

 
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 pckg_WIZMENU.populate_wiz_temp_menu(:parameter.PARM_WIZMENU_ID,PCKG_GCNSTS.PNUM_LOGIN_EMP,PCKG_GCNSTS.pnum_set_of_book_id);

 
 ftree.POPULATE_TREE('MENU');
 :chk_path:=1;
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL('Disabled');
 

 
 GO_BLOCK('DBLK_WIZMENU_FAVOURIT');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 
 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIZ_ERP_MAIN_MENU_ADMIN',TITLE,'Main Menu');
END ;

DECLARE
 LVCH_ICON_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN
 SELECT ICON_NAME INTO LVCH_ICON_NAME 
 FROM WIZMENU_MT M
 WHERE M.WIZMENU_ID = :PARAMETER.PARM_WIZMENU_ID;
 
 IF LVCH_ICON_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 
 win.CHANGE_ICON(LVCH_ICON_NAME );
 END IF;
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-TIMER-EXPIRED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(TIMER_NAME)='SPLASH' THEN
 DELETE_TIMER('NF');

 go_block('DBLK_LICENSED_TO');
 
 execute_query;

 GO_BLOCK('TREE_BLOCK');
 HIDE_WINDOW('WIND_SPLASH');
 set_window_property(forms_mdi_window,window_state,MAXIMIZE);
 
 show_view('CANV_MAIN');
 show_view('CANV_FAVORITE');
ELSE
 :CNT:=:CNT+1;
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('T'||:CNT,VISIBLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SYNCHRONIZE;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 
 LVCH_STARTING_FORM VARCHAR2(300);
 LVCH_CURRENT_FORM VARCHAR2(300);
 
BEGIN
 
 LVCH_STARTING_FORM := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM;
 
 LOOP
 
 NEXT_FORM;
 
 LVCH_CURRENT_FORM := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM;

 EXIT WHEN LVCH_STARTING_FORM = LVCH_CURRENT_FORM;
 EXIT_FORM;
 END LOOP;




END;

SYNCHRONIZE;


DECLARE
 P_LIST PARAMLIST;
 LNUM_ALERT_RETURN NUMBER;
 LVCH_ALERT_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
BEGIN

 
 IF PCKG_GCNSTS.PNUM_LOGIN_PERIOD_ID IS NULL THEN 
 LVCH_ALERT_NAME := 'ALRT_EXIT_APPL';
 ELSE
 LVCH_ALERT_NAME := 'ALRT_EXIT_APPL_PERIOD';
 END IF;
 
 LNUM_ALERT_RETURN := PRO_SHOW_ALERT(LVCH_ALERT_NAME ,'Exit Application','
Are you sure, you want to Exit the Main Menu ?
');

 IF LNUM_ALERT_RETURN = ALERT_BUTTON1 THEN
 
 EXIT_FORM;
 
 ELSIF LNUM_ALERT_RETURN = ALERT_BUTTON3 THEN
 P_LIST := Get_Parameter_List('P_LIST');
 
 IF NOT ID_NULL(P_LIST) THEN DESTROY_PARAMETER_LIST(P_LIST); END IF;
 
 P_LIST := CREATE_PARAMETER_LIST('P_LIST');
 
 ADD_PARAMETER(P_LIST,'PARM_UTILITY_TYPE',TEXT_PARAMETER,'LP');
 open_form('form_utility',ACTIVATE,SESSION,SHARE_LIBRARY_DATA,P_LIST);
 PAUSE;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;

END;
